publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

sense.def: make light of; think little of; be not afraid of; to slight, hold in disrespect, to fail to show the proper respect for (the law etc)
the N2 of ancient times (with or without explicit 之)

tls:line.title: Translation of 典論一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The relation between Fu Yi [d. 90' and Ban Gu [32-92]

tls:line.title: Translation of 典論一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: was nothing less than the relation of a younger brother to an elder brother.

sense.def: and that is all, contraction of 而已 (note the problems of scope: sometimes what the restrictive quantification quantifies over is only the subject, sometimes only the object, and sometimes the whole verb phrase, and at still other times the main verb only. These distinctions have not so far been implemented in tls.)

tls:line.title: Translation of 典論一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: was nothing less than the relation of a younger brother to an elder brother.

tls:line.title: Translation of 典論一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Yet Ban Gu belittled him

sense.def: experience as small, find small; regard as small and insignificant

tls:line.title: Translation of 典論一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Yet Ban Gu belittled him

sense.def: younger brother of the contextually determinate N
the contextually determinate younger brother of N, Npr

tls:line.title: Translation of 典論一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: writing in a letter to his elder brother Ban Zhao [33-108]:

sense.def: have the capacity to VERB properly, be constitutionally able to VERB; be physically capable of, be actually able to
自己把自己 preposed object: oneself as the object, 自殺"kill oneself" Latin: semet ipse (not semet ipsum!)

tls:line.title: Translation of 典論一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: People are good at [or fond of] making themselves known;

sense.def: "Now,", "In fact," introducing new subject for the discourse, and introducing non-narrative theoretical discourse.

tls:line.title: Translation of 典論一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: People are good at [or fond of] making themselves known;

sense.def: man in general; man in the true sense of that word, man who deserves the name of man

sense.def: in full measure, on a large scale; to a complete degree

sense.def: be impressive, be excellent; be the best; be good 甚善
excel in, be particularly good at
make light of; think little of; be not afraid of; to slight, hold in disrespect, to fail to show the proper respect for (the law etc)
